help.tuyaAccessID: Access ID/Client ID from iot.tuya.com project overview page
help.tuyaAccessSecret: Access Secret/Client Secret from iot.tuya.com project overview page
help.tuyaDataCenter: Tuya data center that use your SmartLife/TuyaSmart app. See: https://developer.tuya.com/en/docs/iot/Data_Center_Introduction?id=Kav2hlac2ppnw

SETTING.st_ScanTuyaDevicesSetting: Scan local tuya devices from cloud

TUYA.CONNECT_ISSUE: Unable connect to device. Options to fix: 1. Restart router. 2. Check device battery/connected to socket. 3. Check that ports 6666(UDP), 6667(UDP), 6668(tcp) not blocked by firewall
TUYA.FETCH_DEVICE_INFO: Fetch device info from tuya cloud
TUYA.SCAN_DEVICES: Scan local tuya devices from cloud
TUYA.GET_DEVICE_LIST: API: Get device list from cloud
TUYA.DESCRIPTION_1106:
• Your app account is not linked with your cloud project: Link devices by using the Tuya Smart or Smart Life app with your cloud project on the [Tuya IoT Platform]. For more information, see [Link devices by app account].
  • Incorrect username or password: Enter the correct account and password of the Tuya Smart or Smart Life app in the Account and Password fields. Note that the app account must be the one you used to link devices with your cloud project on the [Tuya IoT Platform].
  • Incorrect countryCode: Enter the [code of the country] you select on logging in to the Tuya Smart or Smart Life app.
TUYA.DESCRIPTION_2406:
• Cloud project created before May 25, 2021: Your cloud project on the [Tuya IoT Platform] should be created after May 25, 2021. Otherwise, you need to create a new project. For more information, see [Operation on the Tuya IoT Platform].
  • Incorret Aavailable Zoneï¼š
    • Select all the **Available Zone**, for how to edit available zone paramter please refer to [Edit project details].
    • Select the correct **Available Zone** according to [Region & Available Zone Correspondence].
TUYA.DESCRIPTION_28841105:
You have not authorized your cloud project to use the required APIs. Subscribe to the following required [API products] and [authorize your project to use them].
  • Authorization
  • Smart Home Devices Management
  • Smart Home Family Management
  • Smart Home Scene Linkage
  • Smart Home Data Service
  • Device Status Notification
